EmailTemplate.description: automated email reminder to the requestor 10 days before the "Due Date" value in the field above if the "EMS Needed" field equals Yes and the "Submitted Date" field is empty
EmailTemplate.name: 10 days before EMS is needed alert
EmailTemplate.subject: Insurance for your event is due within 10 business days
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
As a reminder, the Emergency Medical Service Plan is still due for your event on {!Case.Event_Start__c}. Please make sure to submit the plan directly to Department of Emergency Management as well as into the SFMTA system.
The plan is due by {!Case.EMS_Needed_by_Date__c} for review.
To view your online request, follow the link provided below:
{!Case.Link}
Thank you,
San Francisco Municipal Transportation Agency
